node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊紀錄，7 月 28 日出現症狀。
node.detail_en: The patient has no recent travel history and developed symptoms on July 28.

groups.name_zh: 缸瓦甫警察訓練中心地盤
groups.name_en: Kong Nga Po Police Training Centre Construction Site
groups.description_zh: 缸瓦甫工程地盤位於新屋嶺警察拘留中心附近，正在興建警察高級戰術訓練中心。染疫的 9 名工人主要受聘於土地勘探或土地平整工作的分包商。
groups.description_en: The Kong Nga Po Police Training Centre Construction Site is situated near the San Uk Ling Holding Centre. The nine contracted construction workers diagnosed for the virus are mainly responsible for land surveying and levelling.

node.location_en: Tower 19, Mayfair By The Sea I
Boon Yuet House, Choi Wan (I) Estate
